attributes.action: Remove the statue of General Haigh from Whitehall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that the executed deserters from World War One have been pardoned, due to the realisation that they were shell-shocked, the statue of General Haigh who authorised these executions should be removed from Whitehall.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Greater London Authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
